com.android.server.net

Class NetworkPolicyManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • INetworkPolicyManager.Stub
      • com.android.server.net.NetworkPolicyManagerService

  • public class NetworkPolicyManagerService
extends INetworkPolicyManager.Stub
    Service that maintains low-level network policy rules, using NetworkStatsService statistics to drive those rules.

    Derives active rules by combining a given policy with other system status, and delivers to listeners, such as ConnectivityManager, for enforcement.
